Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Overhaul renderer with 24-bit RGB color, square tiles, and rich theming

Switch from basic ANSI codes to true color \(24-bit RGB\) rendering.
Each world tile now renders as 2 terminal columns wide for square
proportions. Adds themed visuals per tile type \(lush grass, stone walls,
animated water, leafy trees, dirt paths, wooden doors/floors/fences\),
position-based variation for natural look, and a polished dark HUD with
gradient separator and player-colored name highlight.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
